summary: The Voice of Plankton: Waves That Change the Market - In the ocean of the market, small investors, referred to as plankton, begin to unite and make their voices heard on par with the whales of vast capital. They prove that they are not merely existent but a formidable force capable of altering the market's direction. When they all come together, the market becomes fairer, transforming into a sea that belongs to all. Their unity endows them with invincible power.
